attributes.action: A judicial review on the use of abattoir remains of pig in farm animal feed:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister and ask for a judicial review on the use of abattoir remains of pig in farm animal feed: The review to be based on scientific facts. Feeding chicken with pig remains and then recycling chicken waste to feed other farm animals could be potentially harmful and might bring about the return the BSE-like crisis.
We also ask the Prime Minister to legislate that all animal feedstuff should be labelled with ingredients.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
